name: D.U.C.K.
description:
The whole life of not so ordinary "duck."

Walk this path with her, exploring endless labyrinths full of enemies.
It is important to help her to live worthily three stages of her path, following all the hints.
Time is your worst enemy, so do not stand still.

Onward and upward! And take it easy, it's all just an irony.

Get the best score and you will get on the global table of records!

Original soundtracks specially for Ducky.
